note.p: Piper. Employed by the marchioness of Stafford, later the duchess of Sutherland (Anne Sutherland-Leveson-Gower). Born in Farr, Scotland. Married Flora Dolina Macbeth (or Macbeath) in Edinburgh in 1841. Licensee of the Haunch of Venison public house, New Bond Street, London, 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1475/44/5)
Scotland old parish registers marriages 685/1 660 408 Edinburgh (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 17 June 2020)
